insight: ChatControl's Discord integration requires the DiscordSRV plugin. Users must disable DiscordSRV's built-in chat relay by setting `DiscordChatChannelMinecraftToDiscord: false` in DiscordSRV's `config.yml`, otherwise messages get duplicated. ChatControl checks this on startup and logs a warning if it's still enabled (see ChatControl.java line ~247).

The `&#RRGGBB` hex color format (e.g. `&#e6f6f7`) was not supported in format files and other config values prior to the fix in CompChatColor.convertLegacyToMini(). Users should use MiniMessage syntax `<#RRGGBB>` (e.g. `<#e6f6f7>`) as a workaround, which has always been supported. The `&x&R&R&G&G&B&B` ampersand-based extended hex format was also unsupported — only `§x§R§R§G§G§B§B` (section-sign) worked.
